briefTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Study of BCD-022 With Paclitaxel Compared to Herceptin With Paclitaxel in HER2+ Metastatic Breast Cancer Patients
conditions: Human Epithelial Receptor (HER)-2 Positive Breast Cancer

outcomeMeasures.title: Overall Response Rate
outcomeMeasures.description:
Per Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors Criteria (RECIST v1.1) for target lesions and assessed by MRI: Complete Response (CR), Disappearance of all target lesions; Partial Response (PR), \>=30% decrease in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions; Overall Response (OR) = CR + PR.

The response was assessed at the screening, after 3 therapy cycles and after 6 therapy cycles. If CT after 3 or 6 therapy cycles revealed the complete or partial response, a confirmatory CT scan was performed 4 weeks later. The best response during the study was assessed.

outcomeMeasures.title: Area Under the Curve After the First Test Drug Administration
outcomeMeasures.description: Primary outcome measure for pharmacokinetics (PK) substudy. AUC(0-504) of trastuzumab in HER2(+) mBC patients after first administration of BCD-022 with paclitaxel or Herceptin® with paclitaxel.

outcomeMeasures.title: Complete Response Rate
outcomeMeasures.description:
Per Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors Criteria (RECIST v1.1) for target lesions and assessed by MRI: Complete Response (CR), Disappearance of all target lesions; Partial Response (PR), \>=30% decrease in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions; Overall Response (OR) = CR + PR.

The response was assessed at the screening, after 3 therapy cycles and after 6 therapy cycles. If CT after 3 or 6 therapy cycles revealed the complete or partial response, a confirmatory CT scan was performed 4 weeks later. The best response during the study was assessed.

outcomeMeasures.title: Partial Response Rate
outcomeMeasures.description:
Per Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors Criteria (RECIST v1.0) for target lesions and assessed by MRI: Complete Response (CR), Disappearance of all target lesions; Partial Response (PR), \>=30% decrease in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions; Overall Response (OR) = CR + PR.

The response was assessed at the screening, after 3 therapy cycles and after 6 therapy cycles. If CT after 3 or 6 therapy cycles revealed the complete or partial response, a confirmatory CT scan was performed 4 weeks later. The best response during the study was assessed.

outcomeMeasures.title: Stabilization Rate
outcomeMeasures.description:
Per Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors Criteria (RECIST v1.1) for target lesions and assessed by MRI: Complete Response (CR), Disappearance of all target lesions; Partial Response (PR), \>=30% decrease in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions; Overall Response (OR) = CR + PR.

The response was assessed at the screening, after 3 therapy cycles and after 6 therapy cycles. If CT after 3 or 6 therapy cycles revealed the complete or partial response, a confirmatory CT scan was performed 4 weeks later. The best response during the study was assessed.

outcomeMeasures.title: Progression Rate
outcomeMeasures.description:
Per Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors Criteria (RECIST v1.1) for target lesions and assessed by MRI: Complete Response (CR), Disappearance of all target lesions; Partial Response (PR), \>=30% decrease in the sum of the longest diameter of target lesions; Overall Response (OR) = CR + PR.

The response was assessed at the screening, after 3 therapy cycles and after 6 therapy cycles. If CT after 3 or 6 therapy cycles revealed the complete or partial response, a confirmatory CT scan was performed 4 weeks later. The best response during the study was assessed.

outcomeMeasures.title: Treatment Postponed Due to AE/SAE
outcomeMeasures.description: Secondary outcome measure for safety evaluation

outcomeMeasures.title: Treatment Discontinuation Due to AE/SAE
outcomeMeasures.description: Secondary outcome measure for safety evaluation

outcomeMeasures.title: Occurrence of Neutralizing Anti-trastuzumab Antibodies
outcomeMeasures.description: Secondary outcome measure for immunogenicity assessment. Patient was suggested as NAB-positive if neutralizing anti-trastuzumab antibodies were detected at any of the specified timepoints. Total number of NAB-positive patients in each are presented.

outcomeMeasures.title: Cmax After the First Test Drug Administration
outcomeMeasures.description: Secondary outcome measure for PK substudy. Peak serum concentration of trastuzumab after single administration of BCD-022 + paclitaxel or Herceptin® + paclitaxel

outcomeMeasures.title: Tmax After the First Test Drug Administration
outcomeMeasures.description: Secondary outcome measure for PK substudy. Time to reach peak serum concentration of trastuzumab after the first administration of BCD-022 + paclitaxel or Herceptin® + paclitaxel

outcomeMeasures.title: T1/2 After the First Test Drug Administration
outcomeMeasures.description: Secondary outcome measure for PK substudy. Half-life period of trastuzumab after the first administration of BCD-022 + paclitaxel or Herceptin® + paclitaxel.

outcomeMeasures.title: Cmax After the Sixth Test Drug Administration
outcomeMeasures.description: Secondary outcome measure for PK substudy. Peak serum concentration of trastuzumab after the sixth administration of BCD-022 + paclitaxel or Herceptin® + paclitaxel.

outcomeMeasures.title: Tmax After the Sixth Test Drug Administration
outcomeMeasures.description: Secondary outcome measure for PK substudy. Time to reach peak serum concentration of trastuzumab after the sixth administration of BCD-022 + paclitaxel or Herceptin® + paclitaxel
